directions: Mix whiskey, vodka, gin, creme de menthe, cola-flavored beverage, lemon-lime flavored beverage, and sweet and sour mix together in a cocktail shake. Fill a glass with ice; pour drink over ice.
ingredients: 3/4 fluid ounce green creme de menthe
1/2 fluid ounce cola-flavored carbonated beverage (such as Coca-Cola®), or more to taste
1/2 fluid ounce lemon-lime carbonated beverage (such as 7Up®), or to taste
1/2 fluid ounce sweet and sour mix, or to taste
1 cup crushed ice, or as desired
title: Green Hornet
